languages.text: {n}Нотки высокомерия возникают в голосе Паскаля, взирающего на тело Нихель.{/n} "Эксперимент Коллектива Амарнат показывает, что групповое сознание подвержено изъянам наравне с индивидуальным. Мы не могли верно распорядиться своей мощью. Мы уничтожили себя. Но это не значит, что наша сила была плоха. Плохи были мы... большинство из нас".

{n}Arrogance creeps into Pasqal's voice as he gazes at Nihel's body:{/n} "The Amarnat Collective's experiment has demonstrated that a shared consciousness is as prone to flaws as an individual one. We failed to put our power to the right use. We destroyed ourselves. But that does not mean our power was bad. We were bad... most of us."
languages.original_text: {n}Нотки высокомерия возникают в голосе Паскаля, взирающего на тело Нихель.{/n} "Эксперимент Коллектива Амарнат показывает, что групповое сознание подвержено изъянам наравне с индивидуальным. Мы не могли верно распорядиться своей мощью. Мы уничтожили себя. Но это не значит, что наша сила была плоха. Плохи были мы... большинство из нас".

We failed to put our power to the right use. We destroyed ourselves. But that does not mean our power was bad. We were bad... most of us."

languages.text: {n}ニヘルの遺体を見つめるパスカルの声に、傲慢さがにじむ。{/n}「アマルナト集合体の実験は、共有した意識の欠陥の生じやすさは、個別の意識と変わらないということを実証した。私たちはその力を正しく使えなかった。己を破壊した。しかし、私たちの力が悪だったということではない。私たちが悪だったのだ…私たちの大半が」
languages.original_text: {n}Arrogance creeps into Pasqal's voice as he gazes at Nihel's body:{/n} "The Amarnat Collective's experiment has demonstrated that a shared consciousness is as prone to flaws as an individual one. We failed to put our power to the right use. We destroyed ourselves. But that does not mean our power was bad. We were bad... most of us."

traits.locale_text: {n}ニヘルの遺体を見つめるパスカルの声に、傲慢さがにじむ。{/n}「アマルナト集合体の実験は、共有した意識の欠陥の生じやすさは、個別の意識と変わらないということを実証した。私たちはその力を正しく使えなかった。己を破壊した。しかし、私たちの力が悪だったということではない。私たちが悪だったのだ…私たちの大半が」

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡凝视着妮赫尔的尸体，声音中逐渐流露出不屑之意。{/n}“阿玛纳特聚合意识体的实验表明，聚合意识与个人意识一样，都很容易出现缺陷。我们没能正确行使我们的力量，我们摧毁了自己，但这并不意味着力量本身是糟糕的。糟糕的是我们……是我们之中的绝大部分意识。”
languages.original_text: {n}Arrogance creeps into Pasqal's voice as he gazes at Nihel's body:{/n} "The Amarnat Collective's experiment has demonstrated that a shared consciousness is as prone to flaws as an individual one. We failed to put our power to the right use. We destroyed ourselves. But that does not mean our power was bad. We were bad... most of us."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡凝视着雅珀的尸体，声音中逐渐流露出不屑之意。{/n}“阿玛纳特聚合意识体的实验表明，聚合意识与个人意识一样，都很容易出现缺陷。我们没能正确行使我们的力量，我们摧毁了自己，但这并不意味着力量本身是糟糕的。糟糕的是我们……是我们之中的绝大部分意识。”

languages.text: « L'expérience du collectif Amarnat a démontré que, tout comme une conscience individuelle, une conscience partagée n'est pas exempte de défauts, » {n}répond Pasqal avec une pointe d'arrogance tout en posant le regard sur le corps de Nihel.{/n} « Nous n'avons pas réussi à exploiter notre pouvoir comme il l'aurait fallu. Nous nous sommes autodétruits. Mais cela ne signifie pas que notre pouvoir était néfaste. C'est nous, qui étions néfastes... ou tout du moins, la plupart d'entre nous. »
languages.original_text: {n}Arrogance creeps into Pasqal's voice as he gazes at Nihel's body:{/n} "The Amarnat Collective's experiment has demonstrated that a shared consciousness is as prone to flaws as an individual one. We failed to put our power to the right use. We destroyed ourselves. But that does not mean our power was bad. We were bad... most of us."

traits.locale_text: « L'expérience du collectif Amarnat a démontré que, tout comme une conscience individuelle, une conscience partagée n'est pas exempte de défauts, » {n}répond Pasqal avec une pointe d'arrogance tout en posant le regard sur le corps de Nihel.{/n} « Nous n'avons pas réussi à exploiter notre pouvoir comme il l'aurait fallu. Nous nous sommes autodétruits. Mais cela ne signifie pas que notre pouvoir était néfaste. C'est nous, qui étions néfastes... ou tout du moins, la plupart d'entre nous. »

languages.text: {n}Pasqal comienza a observar el cuerpo de Nihel y su voz se vuelve arrogante.{/n} «El experimento del Colectivo Amarnat ha demostrado que una conciencia colectiva es tan propensa a errar como una individual. No logramos usar nuestro poder adecuadamente, nos destruimos, pero eso no quiere decir que nuestro poder sea malo. La mayoría... éramos malos».
languages.original_text: {n}Arrogance creeps into Pasqal's voice as he gazes at Nihel's body:{/n} "The Amarnat Collective's experiment has demonstrated that a shared consciousness is as prone to flaws as an individual one. We failed to put our power to the right use. We destroyed ourselves. But that does not mean our power was bad. We were bad... most of us."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal comienza a observar el cuerpo de Nihel y su voz se vuelve arrogante.{/n} «El experimento del Colectivo Amarnat ha demostrado que una conciencia colectiva es tan propensa a errar como una individual. No logramos usar nuestro poder adecuadamente, nos destruimos, pero eso no quiere decir que nuestro poder sea malo. La mayoría... éramos malos».

languages.text: {n}Arroganz schleicht sich in Pasqals Stimme, als er auf Nihels Leiche blickt.{/n} "Das Experiment des Amarnat-Kollektivs hat gezeigt, dass ein geteiltes Bewusstsein ebenso fehleranfällig ist wie ein individuelles. Wir haben unsere Kraft nicht richtig eingesetzt. Wir haben uns selbst vernichtet. Doch das bedeutet nicht, dass unsere Kraft schlecht war. Wir waren schlecht ... die meisten von uns."
languages.original_text: {n}Arrogance creeps into Pasqal's voice as he gazes at Nihel's body:{/n} "The Amarnat Collective's experiment has demonstrated that a shared consciousness is as prone to flaws as an individual one. We failed to put our power to the right use. We destroyed ourselves. But that does not mean our power was bad. We were bad... most of us."

traits.locale_text: {n}Arroganz schleicht sich in Pasqals Stimme, als er auf Nihels Leiche blickt.{/n} "Das Experiment des Amarnat-Kollektivs hat gezeigt, dass ein geteiltes Bewusstsein ebenso fehleranfällig ist wie ein individuelles. Wir haben unsere Kraft nicht richtig eingesetzt. Wir haben uns selbst vernichtet. Doch das bedeutet nicht, dass unsere Kraft schlecht war. Wir waren schlecht ... die meisten von uns."

languages.text: {n}Nihel'in cesedine bakan Pasqal'ın sesine kibir hâkim oluyor:{/n} "Amarnat Bütünlüğü'nün deneyi gösterdi ki paylaşılan bir bilinç de hataya bireysel bir bilinç kadar açık. Gücümüzü doğru amaçla kullanmakta başarısız olduk. Kendi kendimizi yok ettik. Ama bu, gücümüzün kötü olduğu anlamına gelmiyor. Kötü olan bizlerdik. Çoğumuz."
languages.original_text: {n}Arrogance creeps into Pasqal's voice as he gazes at Nihel's body:{/n} "The Amarnat Collective's experiment has demonstrated that a shared consciousness is as prone to flaws as an individual one. We failed to put our power to the right use. We destroyed ourselves. But that does not mean our power was bad. We were bad... most of us."
